Subclass/Dual Class Master Raina:

Hello! I will be assisting you with reawakening an Awakened dual class. To reawaken a dual class, you need to have an Awakened dual class. After reawakening, your level will be reduced to level 85 and all the skills you've learne will be forgotten.

(Change dual classes and your level will be reset to level 85). "I'll reawaken the duall class (reset)".
